mapper.sql: MbrWineCustom.id as id, MbrWineCustom.mbr_wine_custom_order_id as mbr_wine_custom_order_id, MbrWineCustom.wine_custom_id as wine_custom_id, MbrWineCustom.win_custom_id as win_custom_id, MbrWineCustom.winery_id as winery_id, MbrWineCustom.mbr_id as mbr_id, MbrWineCustom.custom_cnt as custom_cnt, MbrWineCustom.custom_price as custom_price, MbrWineCustom.custom_total_amt as custom_total_amt, MbrWineCustom.custom_name as custom_name, MbrWineCustom.sku_name as sku_name, MbrWineCustom.create_date as create_date, MbrWineCustom.modify_date as modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into m_mbr_wine_custom (id, mbr_wine_custom_order_id, wine_custom_id, win_custom_id, winery_id, mbr_id, custom_cnt, custom_price, custom_total_amt, custom_name, sku_name, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{mbrWineCustomOrderId}, #{wineCustomId}, #{winCustomId}, #{wineryId}, #{mbrId}, #{customCnt}, #{customPrice}, #{customTotalAmt}, #{customName}, #{skuName}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update m_mbr_wine_custom
mbr_wine_custom_order_id = #{mbrWineCustomOrderId},
wine_custom_id = #{wineCustomId},
win_custom_id = #{winCustomId},
winery_id = #{wineryId},
mbr_id = #{mbrId},
custom_cnt = #{customCnt},
custom_price = #{customPrice},
custom_total_amt = #{customTotalAmt},
custom_name = #{customName},
sku_name = #{skuName},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
